name: Blinds and Shutters
tag_list: shutters-houston, plantation-shutters-houston, blinds-houston, wood-blinds, vertical-blinds, window-shades
description: The Blinds & Shutters mobile shopping ex
overview:
The Blinds & Shutters mobile shopping experience brings the showroom directly to your living room. Where would you rather see your window coverings - in a home improvement center or in the very same room they will be installed? See the colors and textures the way they should be seen - in the natural lighting of your home.

“Blinds and Shutters is a blind and shutters distributor and installer in Houston, Texas. We established in 2000 as a response to the lack of high quality installers of blinds and shutters in Houston, Texas at the time.

Our knowledge of the product, and our determination to provide the absolute best service has since developed a dedicated customer base amongst interior designers, architects and householders”
